attributes.action: Make November officially recongnised as “Remembrance Month” in the UK
attributes.background: Members of HMAF have died across the globe protecticing not only those who reside in the UK but millions around the globe. One day is not enough to remember those who lost limbs or paid the ultimate price for the salvation of our nation. Lest we forget

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the Royal British Legion and not the UK Government or Parliament.
